msbt.message: It feels like I've been waiting forever, but Halloween is finally here! Ooh, I can't wait to carbo-load with candy!
It's Halloween! Are you pumped, ? Get PUMPED!You've heard of a cheat day? This is the cheat day of all cheat days for me! I take my candy very seriously.
I've got to be nimble and quick on my feet today, so I've been tapering down my usual workout routine.Halloween is like a competitionor a raceor the WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP of candy, !
The clock's ticking Are you ready for Halloween fun? I mean mentally AND physically?I've been curling bags of candy for weeks to get ready, !
Halloween fun is about to start! I'm not scaredI'm just shaking with anticipation!
Got my candy! Got my costume! Oh yeah! I'm ready to scare Halloween itself, !
Have you noticed the pumpkin decorations that have been popping up around here, ?Don't tell anyone, but pumpkins are a great substitute for medicine balls in a pinch.
I keep seeing all of these pumpkin decorations and getting stressed out about Halloween. My costume isn't ready! And I need to crank up my step count so I can collect as much candy as possible!
It feels like the pumpkin stuff is starting to take over the island!What's it gonna be like when it's actually Halloween?
Wow, the whole island reminds me of my gym, except every weight has been replaced with a pumpkin.Can you believe how cool everything is looking? I can't wait for Halloween now, !
